inputStruct:
{
	"name": data[1],
	"originalName": data[2],
	"description": data[3],
	"picture": SKIP('picture', data[4].split(".").map( function(item, index){ return index == 0 ? item.toUpperCase() : item }).join("."), data[4] === ''),
	"category": SKIP('category', data[6], ''),
	"appearance": SKIP('appearance', data[7].split(",").map( item => item.trim() ).filter( item => item ), data[7] === ''),
	"topic": SKIP('topic', data[8], '')
}
